content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 
    --ChargeType
    --EffectivePrice
    --,UnitPrice
    --,Quantity
    --,(UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity as [Cost Saving]
    --,IsRIUsage
    sum((UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as [Cost Saving Total]
    --sum((EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as [Cost Saving Total]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/202*/Extended_v2_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where (IsRIUsage = 'RI Usage' or ChargeType = 'UnusedReservation')
    and [Date] >= '2022-11-01' and [Date] <= '2023-10-31'
